data.actual_result: It stacks the previous username with the new one
data.expected_result: A message saying that the friend request can't be sent
data.short_description: Sending a friend request to person who has it off stacks previous request
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a friend request to a friend that doesn't have it off - Send a request to someone who has friend requests disabled, like 0001#0001 -
